document_data.name: Company of the Trollblood Blade
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of the Trollblood Blade''' was a renowned and chartered adventuring company of [[Cormyr]], active in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1348}}, the Company of the Trollblood Blade was a famous group of heroes in service of the Crown of Cormyr. Even mention of their name caused whispers and excited murmurs. The company was mentioned by King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]] when then-unknown [[adventurer]]s – [[Knights of Myth Drannor|Swords of Eveningstar]], were granted Cormyr's official adventuring charter. King Azoun held a grand ceremony in the town of [[Espar]] and competed the young adventurers to the still famed Company of the Manticore Cloaks, predicting the Swords' bright future, reaching the fame and prosperity of the Trollbloods and the [[Company of the Manticore Cloaks]].
